Text:

@rajmxxx: "Next week" on Sunday (yesterday) means - this week.

And please - be so kind and stop a bombardment with requests. You cannot seed back your requests  - and requester have obligation to seed back for 48h, requested title only and at full speed.

That way is only way to give back to community and to actual encoder and uploader.

Keeping in mind a volume of your requests and your miserable upload speed should make you to step on your internal break.

Unless you are not trying to end-up "blind-listed".
